artist: Designer: Jean-Claude-Thomas Duplessis; Painter: Pierre-Joseph Rosset; Manufacturer: French National Porcelain Manufacture
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
markings: Marks in blue at underside of tureen and under-plate: an axe (Near one edge) and a bell surrounding the initial B (at center)
medium: Hand painted and gilded soft-paste porcelain
title: Covered tureen and underplate
